name: Grey Bones
description:
Gray Bone fights for peace in the beautiful universe of the Gray Orange World!

Some of the creatures were covered with red skin and became hostile and aggressive, the most dangerous creatures can shock and do not let anyone into their territory. In the Gray-orange world, there is very little habitable land, and it is all divided into islands, the main character will have to destroy all the hostile creatures and solve all the puzzles.



Features of the game:
  • A lot of jumping and moving in the horizontal and vertical direction
  • Endless rounds of ammunition
  • Teleports TVs and doors!
  • Levers and switches.
  • Dangerous opponents throw thorns, electrocute and shoot.
